title: Christmas event skins
body:
Haven't played during a christmas event before, so I don't really know how it works. But I'm wondering if they usually bring back all of the past christmas skins?

I want to get my hands on WW Lulu and Mistletoe leblanc :P

replies.body: I *think* they opened the Vault for a time. I don't really remember.
If I remember correctly they did last year but I think it was the first time they'd done so.
